sentence.text: When we generated tricellulin-knockout epidermis development (Tric(-/-)), we found an early-onset rapidly progressive hearing loss associated with the degeneration of hair cells (mitochondrion organization); however, their body size and overall appearance were normal.
Although mutations in the gene encoding tricellulin are known to cause deafness in humans (DFNB49) and epidermis development, the influence of its systemic deletion in vivo remains unknown.
